title: George Clooney looking forward to the "adventure" of parenthood as he speaks about expecting twins with wife Amal
text:
George Clooney looking forward to the "adventure" of parenthood as he speaks about expecting twins with wife Amal The star is set to become a father for the first time at the age of 55 Share George Clooney is excited about welcoming twins with his wife Amal Alamuddin (Photo: Cousart/JFXimages/WENN.com)     
George Clooney has opened up about becoming a father for the first time. 
The 55-year-old star is expecting twins with his wife Amal , and has spoken publicly about the pregnancy for the first time. 
The star says that parenthood will "be an adventure" and that he's "really excited" to be welcoming his twins - believed to be a boy and a girl - in June. 
He said: "We are really happy and really excited. It's going to be an adventure. We've sort of embraced it all with arms wide open." Read More George Clooney's mum confirms actor's pregnant wife Amal is expecting twin boy and girl George and Amal are expecting twins 
And the Monument's Men star says his friends were "very supportive" of the news, despite having given him a hard time at first. 
He added to French programme Rencontres de Cinema: "Then it got really quiet, and they all just started making baby crying noises. And the whole table just busted up laughing." 
Meanwhile, a source previously claimed the Money Monster actor was "excited but nervous"about becoming a father. 
The insider said: "George is excited but nervous. He is excited about the kids, but also has the normal amount of nerves that come with being parents ... The twins will be their first children (Photo: Getty)
